effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.

short_effect.sun_moon: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.
